response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. It's a unique and valuable item that has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, we believe it would be a great addition to your collection or business. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the chance to purchase this product for $12,000. This price reflects a fair compromise between its value and what we believe is a reasonable asking price for such an item. I look forward to your consideration and hope to facilitate a transaction that benefits both parties.", "product_price": 12000}
